name: The Lasers! - Puzzle game
description:
The Lasers! is a puzzle game in which the player needs to activate all receivers.

Features of the game:
- Lots of levels.
- Pleasant style of graphics.
- Nice relax music.
- A lot of different elements interacting with lasers.
- The difficulty increases with each chapter.

Complete levels, open new chapters, challenge yourself!

We planning to add level generation in future updates!
